main.text: Mutag Haetz is a leading trading company specializing in the sale and distribution of wood products. The company offers a wide range of high-quality and diverse products, including oak and pine wood panels, stairs, M.D.P, and plywood.

Oak and pine wood panels are excellent solutions for interior design and furniture. Stairs, M.D.P, and plywood can be used to create a variety of products such as tables, clothing wardrobes, furniture, wall coverings, and more.
Mutag Haetz is committed to excellent service and reliability, consistently providing the best solutions to its customers in the field of wood products.

features.title: Available 24/7 for any questions you may have
